hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   procarbazine .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both procarbazine and zidovudine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  procarbazine  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both procarbazine and zolmitriptan can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under Antidepressant drugs for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  procarbazine  and  zolmitriptan  can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under  Antidepressant drugs  for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.
